@ ariannasdaddy

"Im not gettin audio when playin with my WD media device. Quality is great though... can i cnvert into different format and gain audio without loosing video quality?"

Your WD Media Player is not one of the newer ones - it passes the DTS audio through the Digital Optical Cable to your DTS capable stereo.  If you don't have a DTS capable stereo - it would be cheaper to just by the newer WD Media Player (be sure to check the specifications on the box to see if it is DTS ready).

Considering you sent that post a few years ago you probably found one solution or another to playing this movie. LOL :)
